alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL WAKULLA... SOUTHEASTERN GADSDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN LEON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 405 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Griffin Heights, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, Wetumpka, Bloxham, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Sawdust, and State Capital Complex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
